channel.title: Notes on Tuan Truong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Tuan Truong's Blog

item.title: 12Bay integrated SwiftUI. With 12Bay, no StoryBoard, no XIB files, no cocoapods, ...
item.description: Bus booking function write by SwiftUI For three months, I dedicated myself to learning SwiftUI and using it to develop a bus booking feature. Along the way, I faced several challenges in integrating SwiftUI into an existing UIKit-based project. In my upcoming articles, I will dive deep into these challenges, providing detailed insights and solutions. But first, let’s explore the user interface for booking a ride, which includes selecting a bus route, choosing seats, and specifying pickup/drop-off points.

item.title: Understand View in SwiftUI
item.description: Abstract In this article, we will learn about view in SwiftUI. This article is part of the SwiftUI Series - SwiftUI Series - Updating TTBaseUIKit to support SwiftUI View is a function of state, not a sequence of events - apple Woaaaa ! SwiftUI - Apple’s declarative framework for building user interfaces. The user interface is defined based on the current state of the application, and any changes to the state automatically update the corresponding views.

item.title: Understand safe area in SwiftUI
item.description: Abstract In this article, we will learn about Safe Area in SwiftUI. This article is part of the SwiftUI Series - SwiftUI Series - Updating TTBaseUIKit to support SwiftUI Related knowledge What is the Layout? In the Apple ecosystem, Layout refers to the process of arranging and positioning user interface elements such as views and controls on a screen or within a container view using layout constraints, Auto Layout, or SwiftUI.

item.title: Common phrases in English
What's the difference between who, whom, and whose, and how do we use these?
Key Notes in Economics
item.description: These are the small notes that I record to remember while reading books about economics or learning about financial knowledge. With so many terms and concepts that I don’t understand, I make a point to write them down to aid my studies. You can easily search for specific words or descriptions to find what you need quickly. Type something in the input field to search the table for keywords or description:

item.title: Latex Take Notes
item.description: The 14th Asian Conference on Intelligent Information and Database Systems https://aciids.pwr.edu.pl/2022/download/ACIIDS_2022_HCMC_Flyer_v.7.0.pdf MY TOPIC: Predictive modelling of diseases based on a network and machine learning approach, I hope it’s approved soon ^^ Paper Submission: The proceedings of ACIIDS 2022 will be published by Springer in series Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and will be distributed at the conference LNCS/LNAI style. Should not exceed 13 pages. Here is a my collect data with purpose to learn, more knowledge from large amount of examples, solutions, and ideas on the internet.

item.title: The vision
item.description: Cryptocurrency World Type something in the input field to search the table for keywords or description: $(document).ready(function(){ $("#myInput").on("keyup", function() { var value = $(this).val().toLowerCase(); $("table tbody tr").filter(function() { $(this).toggle($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(value) -1) }); }); }); Key Define More **v√≠ metamask S&P 500 is a stock market index in the United States that includes 500 of the largest and most popular companies.
